ItemTooltips.flask: Though not listed, you can buy the recipe for your Soul Ring, the ingredients needed for it can be bought at the side-shop.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Vladmir's Offering is to better support your team and to make your pushing power even stronger. Broodmother offers survivability, further lifesteal and damage!
ItemTooltips.orchid: This is to disable your opponent further with your Insatiable Hunger ability and your Incapacitating Bite
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: Necromonicon can reveal invisible units at level 3 with True Sight and heighten his pushing abilities thanks to the attack speed buff and the additional minions.
ItemTooltips.assault: Assault Cuirass is to provide even stronger support for your main carries and pushing power.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Daedalus is a great item in combination with your slow and lack of damage as Daedalus let's you utilize your ultimate on different foes as you quickly finish off your initial targets.
ItemTooltips.basher: Though you have your slow and Orchid Malevolence, Basher contributes further CC  to prevent those feeling or give an even stronger advantage to Broodmother.
ItemTooltips.manta: Push hard with Manta Style that gives Broodmother further ways to get rid of debuffs and dish out faster damage on ganked foes and to tear down lanes.
ItemTooltips.yasha: Yasha gives you additional movement speed and farming you want even if revealed in your web. Consider Yasha if you're looking for some in-between items to get to Extension Items.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring:
Buy the recipe for this item first as you can pick up the ingredients at the side-shop.

Soul Ring is your core item. In combination with Spin Web's increased health regeneration and your Spawn Spiderlings ability.

AbilityTooltips.broodmother_spawn_spiderlings:
Use Spawn Spiderlings to earn last hits and push the lanes. Be careful not to feed these spiderlings to your opponents otherwise they will earn a lot of experience and gold.

You can use spiderlings made in lane to farm local jungle camps.
AbilityTooltips.broodmother_spin_web:
Spin Web let's you traverse over cliffs, through trees and anywhere unobstructed. Use it as an escape or to scout out areas near the lane in case of ganks.

Be careful of Sentry Wards as they disable your free pathing/walk. This ability works well with Soul Ring and Spawn Spiderlings ability.
AbilityTooltips.broodmother_incapacitating_bite: Couple the slow and miss chance with Broodmother's ultimate and you have a very strong late-game carry.
AbilityTooltips.broodmother_insatiable_hunger: Use this ultimate to heal yourself given its low cooldown. It's also great to shift tides of battle in your favour so long as you have Black King Bar to keep you consistently attacking and regaining life.
